summary: An email from the FBI Victim Services Division to law firms representing identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein, inviting them to victim briefings scheduled for October 15th in Miami and October 23rd in New York. The email serves as a notification and logistical coordination for victim outreach.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the FBI's outreach and briefing invitations.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively coordinating briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in late 2019.
Two briefings were scheduled: October 15, 2019, in Miami and October 23, 2019, in New York.
The communication was directed at law firms representing victims, indicating organized legal representation for many victims.
The FBI was soliciting contact information for additional clients who may not have received an invitation, suggesting an ongoing effort to identify and include all victims.
